name: Hide Comrade
description:
Be a good citizen!

In a dystopian not-so-far future, an oppressive government had to impose an 8h curfew and a ban on parties. As a rebel, you decide to go against the rule, but the robot from the ministry is now knocking at your door.  

With 4 friends, run around a house to hide all the party references. If you fail, the government will give you a fine. Beware the robot of the ministry.
